attributes.action: cut tax on savings to help savers who rely on savings income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: base rate cut will help many, but pensioner who have only small pensions and rely on savings income will suffer as they will lose two fifths of their income as result of the last two base rate cuts. Therefore please consider tax cuts on savings for pensioners.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
